Name: Endpoint
Desc: After eliminating crucial Kuroro, the endpoint will be activated. Reach the endpoint to end the stage.

Name: Spike
Desc: Spikes will come out when you walk past and no one can pass.

Name: Stone Gate
Desc: Step on the Stone Gate Mechanism to lower all the Stone Gates and pass.

Name: Endpoint
Desc: After eliminating crucial Kuroro, the endpoint will be activated. Reach the endpoint to end the stage.

Name: Stone Gate Mechanism
Desc: Step on the Stone Gate Mechanism to lower all the Stone Gates and pass.

Name: Electro-Wall
Desc: When powered on, the Electro-Wall will eliminate anything that touches it. Step on its switch to turn it off.

Name: Trap
Desc: When you step on a trap, you will fall into it and be eliminated.

Name: Electro-Wall Switch
Desc: The switch of the Electro-Wall. Step on it to power on the Electro-Wall.

Name: Electro-Wall Switch
Desc: The switch of the Electro-Wall. Step on it to power on the Electro-Wall.

Name: Shadow
Desc: The Shadow will move along with the character you control but can't eliminate enemies.

Name: Grass Field
Desc: It blocks all characters passing by. It burns when it comes in contact with fire, and grows when it comes in contact with Lightning Attribute.

Name: Pool
Desc: Characters passing by a pool will fall in and be eliminated. Characters carrying ice will freeze the surface of the water, creating a walkable path.

Name: Teleporting Mist
Desc: Teleport through resonance with characters carrying Dark Attribute.

Name: Teleporting Mist
Desc: Teleport through resonance with characters carrying Dark Attribute.

Name: Teleporting Mist
Desc: Teleport through resonance with characters carrying Dark Attribute.

Name: Green SFX of Teleporting (Opening and Closing)
Yellow SFX of Teleporting (Opening and Closing)
Purple SFX of Teleporting (Opening and Closing)
Lightning Circle
Desc: It will trap any Lightning characters passing through it and be destroyed when Dark characters pass through it.

Name: Ice
Desc: You can easily melt floating ice on the water with fire.
